Adventure Guildsman Reeya:
Hello! My name is Reeya, I'm from the Adventure Guild.
Usually, Enchanted Valley is a rather quiet place. But recently, the adventurers began to find strange artifacts here, and later monsters appeared.
Where all this came from and why, no one knows. The king of Aden ordered our guild to look into what happened.
We've just started the case, so we haven't found anything useful yet.
Such artifacts are said to have been found in other places as well - at the Anghel Waterfall, the Ancient Battleground, the Ivory Tower Crater and the Blazing Swamp. I hope you can help us explore them.
